intro: Andrachne tenera, commonly known as the slender sandwort, is a low-growing perennial plant native to arid and semi-arid regions of the Mediterranean. It belongs to the family Montiaceae and is characterized by its succulent, fleshy leaves that help it retain moisture in dry environments.
